text: Christopher McRae (October 20, 1873 – January 28, 1938) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of British Columbia from 1924 to 1928 from the electoral district of Vancouver City, as a Liberal. He was the president and manager of the Alberta Timber Company based in Vancouver. ==References== Category:British Columbia Liberal Party MLAs Category:People from Bruce County Category:Politicians from Vancouver Category:1873 births Category:1938 deaths
title: Christopher McRae
